Text: It is shameful the UK Government won't condemn Trump.Now is the time to speak up for justice and equality.#BlackLivesMatter #JusticeForGeorgeFloyd

Please don't just post a black square. Write to your MP now with these demands: - Immediate suspension of UK sales of teargas, riot shields + rubber bullets to the US - Condemn Trump's use of force against his own citizens- Release the delayed report into BAME Covid deaths

Joe Biden begins his remarks: " 'I can't breathe. I can't breathe.' George Floyd's last words. But they didn't die with him. They're still being heard. Echoing across this nation....'I can't breathe.' It's a wake-up call for our nation. For all of us."

Biden calls on Congress to pass police reforms:- outlaw chokeholds- stop transferring weapons of war to police- better oversight ; accountabilityCommits to creating national police oversight commission in the first 100 days of presidency.

Note: Trump is literally drawing on one of the most ubiquitous phrases of Nazi Party propaganda. "Ein Volk, ein Reich, ein Führer." "One (racial) national people. One empire. One leader." It means, "The one law is total obedience." This is fascism in giant blinking neon lights
@JoeBiden Biden later adds he supports Congress passing a ban police chokeholds — a @RepJeffries proposal -- and putting a stop to police departments being able to purchase military weapons.

"The President held up a Bible yesterday. I just wish he opened it once in a while...in addition to opening the Bible, he should open up the Constitution once in a while." –Soon to be President, Joe Biden
As Donald Trump poses on the steps of a church holding a Bible, Christians everywhere try to recall the bit where it advocates using tear gas on peaceful protestors for a photo op.
Fuck Donald TrumpFuck AuthoritarianismFuck White Supremacy Especially Fuck the police that enable all of the above. We gotta save this country.  #BlackLivesMatter

Please don't just post a black square. Write to your MP now with these demands: - Immediate suspension of UK sales of teargas, riot shields + rubber bullets to the US - Condemn Trump's use of force against his own citizens- Release the delayed report into BAME Covid deaths
